In Game Description: Love for you and love between island dwellers
Description for Writers: Social harmony, represents community members working cooperatively and getting along

In Game Description: Hope that the island will be a happy place
Description for Writers: Investment in the future, represents the community's hopes that your decision will make the community better

In Game Description: Joy island dwellers experience every day
Description for Writers: Entertainment, represents how much the community will enjoy the outcome of your decision

In Game Description: Pieces toys need to stay in good repair
Description for Writers: Physical needs, represents the community's ability to sustain themselves and also provide for those who need repair

In Game Description: Toys need to be ready to be played with again
Description for Writers: Normalcy, represents the community's ability to hold to toy traditions and appear to be good to play with
